sentences.sContent: There are still bears to be encountered though, albeit from the safety of our boat - two cubs and a grizzly idling along the waterside; a black bear emerging from the river.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are still bears to be encountered though, albeit from the safety of our boat - two cubs and a grizzly idling along the waterside; a black bear emerging from the river.
sentences.sCn: 我们居然遇到了熊，尽管我们安坐在船上——一头大灰熊和两只小熊在水边闲逛，一头黑熊从水中冒出头来。
